author: Annabelle Timsit
title: Family Dollar closes 400 stores, recalls products after FDA finds decaying dead rodents in warehouse - The Washington Post
description: The FDA found « insanitary conditions » at a Family Dollar distribution facility in West Memphis, Ark., and said some products could have been contaminated.
content:
Family Dollar, which is owned by the retail giant Dollar Tree, announced a voluntary recall late Friday of some products that came from the West Memphis facility.
The recall covers Food and Drug Adm… [+4276 chars]
